title: Cheesy Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['30g butter, melted', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons sun-dried tomato pesto', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '250g ready-made cheese sauce', '280g chopped cooked chicken breast meat', '1 (12 inch) pre-baked pizza base', '1 medium tomato, sliced', '115g feta cheese']
